title: OPI Avojuice Skin Quenchers Coconut Melon Juicie, 6.6-Ounce Bottles
description: Avojuice Skin Quencers Hand and Body Lotion give skin a juicy moisture blast. Like happy skin in a bottle, bursting with naturally hydrating essences and luscious aromas, for silkier, smoother, more touchable skin. Lightweight and the perfect daily moisture fix with a juicy burst of natural moisturizers and soothing aloe and avocado extracts. Pure refreshment for your skin.
